premise_source_doc_sentence: As a Southern Gothic novel and a Bildungsroman , the primary themes of To Kill a Mockingbird involve racial injustice and the destruction of innocence .

claim: To Kill a Mockingbird explores the theme of economic injustice.
premise_source_doc_sentence: To Kill a Mockingbird was Lee 's only published book until Go Set a Watchman , an earlier draft of To Kill a Mockingbird , was published on July 14 , 2015 .

claim: To Kill a Mockingbird explores the theme of economic injustice.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In honor of the 50th anniversary , famous authors and celebrities as well as people close to the book 's author , Harper Lee , shared their experiences with To Kill a Mockingbird in the book Scout , Atticus , & Boo : A Celebration of Fifty Years of To Kill a Mockingbird .

claim: To Kill a Mockingbird explores the theme of economic injustice.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Another novel , Go Set a Watchman , was written in the mid-1950s and published in July 2015 as a `` sequel '' , though it was later confirmed to be To Kill a Mockingbird 's first draft .

claim: To Kill a Mockingbird explores the theme of economic injustice.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Author Mary McDonough Murphy , who collected individual impressions of To Kill a Mockingbird by several authors and public figures , calls the book `` an astonishing phenomenon '' .
